title: Sadiq Khan – 2021 Statement Following Fire in Elephant and Castle
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Sadiq Khan, the Mayor of London, on 28 June 2021.
content:
My thoughts are with all those affected by the very serious fire in Elephant and Castle. I am in close contact with the Fire Commissioner.
